ygData.subject: Re: OOC: Characters

If you want, I could help you out with some characters. My schedules
will b=
e more stable in the coming weeks, so I will be able to bring
more people i=
n.

Also, I could retake the Silver Wings if nobody has control of them,
un=
less the current controller wants to keep them.

Now for two completely unr=
elated announcements:

1) I'm moving out! I found an appartment! I actually=
 thought it
would've been more difficult, but my girlfriend and I found tha=
t
pretty quick! Don't worry, internet is definitely coming along! So on
apr=
il 1st (I know the date is kinda funny), you guys think of me an
send posit=
ive thought!

2) I was thinking about trying a RPG with a slightly differen=
t format.
It would be a Beast Machines RPG (set after the show) where you c=
ould
play either a BW-type character, a BM char or a vehicon. I'd like to
t=
ry it with me being the only storyteller for any and every one of
your char=
acter. There would be some sort of gameplay mechanics (for
example, me roll=
ing the dice for yourchars behind my screen or
something), but that's not y=
et developped. Story-wise, Maximals and
predacons would be there, while sil=
ver wings and Iron Skulls actually
reject the choice of reformatting to tec=
hno-organics. Tell me if
you're interested!
